welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Victoria Falls, known for its breathtaking views, rich culture and warm hospitality. Get ready to experience the charm of this city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore everything Victoria Falls has in store for you!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Livingstone Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: VIP Terminal
terminals.description: The VIP terminal at Livingstone Airport offers exclusive services for premium travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Victoria Falls Airport handles both international and domestic flights.

terminals.name: Domestic Terminal
terminals.description: The domestic terminal at Victoria Falls Airport handles flights within Zimbabwe.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.
